text: Survivor Series (1987) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by the World Wrestling Federation (WWF). It took place on November 26, 1987 at the Richfield Coliseum in Richfield Township, Ohio. It was the first Survivor Series event held by the WWF. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Randy Savage, Jake Roberts, Ricky Steamboat, Brutus Beefcake, and Jim Duggan (with Miss Elizabeth) defeated The Honky Tonk Man, Hercules, Danny Davis, Ron Bass, and Harley Race (with Bobby Heenan and Jimmy Hart) Five-on-five Survivor Series elimination match 23:38 2 The Fabulous Moolah, Rockin' Robin, Velvet McIntyre, and The Jumping Bomb Angels (Itsuki Yamazaki and Noriyo Tateno) defeated Sensational Sherri, The Glamour Girls (Leilani Kai and Judy Martin), Donna Christanello, and Dawn Marie (with Jimmy Hart) Five-on-five Survivor Series elimination match 20:17 3 Strike Force (Tito Santana and Rick Martel), The Young Stallions (Paul Roma and Jim Powers), The Fabulous Rougeaus (Jacques and Raymond), The Killer Bees (Jim Brunzell and Brian Blair), and The British Bulldogs (Davey Boy Smith and Dynamite Kid) defeated The Hart Foundation (Bret Hart and Jim Neidhart), The Islanders (Haku and Tama), Demolition (Ax and Smash), The Bolsheviks (Nikolai Volkoff and Boris Zhukov) and The Dream Team (Greg Valentine and Dino Bravo) (with Johnny Valiant, Slick, Jimmy Hart, Bobby Heenan, and Mr. Fuji) Twenty-man tag team Survivor Series elimination match 37:14 4 André the Giant, One Man Gang, King Kong Bundy, Butch Reed, and Rick Rude (with Bobby Heenan and Slick) defeated Hulk Hogan, Paul Orndorff, Don Muraco, Ken Patera, and Bam Bam Bigelow (with Oliver Humperdink) Five-on-five Survivor Series elimination match 22:07 === Survivor Series elimination matches === Eliminated Wrestler
